Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_MDI_driver_type

The function AIL_MDI_driver_type reports the MIDI synthesis technology available with a specified.

S32 AIL_MDI_driver_type(
  HMDIDRIVER mdi
);

In Parameters

mdi
indicates the driver whose synthesis technology is to be reported.

Returns

One of the MILES_MDI_DRIVER_TYPE constants.

Discussion

MDI driver.

This function is intended to allow applications to select different versions of their MIDI sequences based on the driver in use. Although MSS applications may use the same MIDI files across all synthesis platforms if desired, the highest level of quality can always be obtained through the use of specifically "tweaked" sequences for the General MIDI and FM platforms. The values given above range from 0 to 3 respectively; one way to take advantage of this feature is to add the ASCII letter ‘A' to the returned value and use this value to access XMIDI files whose names differ by the first letter; e.g. A_DEMO.XMI, B_DEMO.XMI, C_DEMO.XMI, and D_DEMO.XMI.


Group: XMIDI Services
Related Basic Types: HMDIDRIVER, MILES_MDI_DRIVER_TYPE, S32
